text.section: Every determination required by this code shall be in writing and based upon written findings of the public official making the determination. These determinations and written findings shall be retained in the official contract file.
The determinations required by KRS 45A.345 to 45A.460 shall be final and conclusive unless they are clearly erroneous, arbitrary, capricious, or contrary to law.

law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 72, effective January 1, 1980.
